channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An Age-Old Fear Grows More Common: ‘I’m Going To Die Alone’
item.description: As families fracture, people are living longer and are more likely to find themselves without close relatives or friends at the end of their lives.

item.title: Health insurance premiums are going up next year — unless you work at these companies
item.description: As U.S. health insurance costs rise, some companies are paying for all of their workers' premiums. It's a big expense — but they say it pays off.

item.title: A study found lead in popular protein powders. Here's why you shouldn't panic
item.description: Consumer Reports expressed concern about high levels of lead in some two dozen protein powders, but only with repeated high exposure. Here's what to k...

item.title: 'Death fold' proteins can make cells self-destruct. Scientists want to control them
item.description: Scientists are hoping to treat diseases including cancer and Alzheimer's by influencing how cells make life-or-death decisions.

item.title: KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Schrödinger’s Government Shutdown
item.description: Democrats and Republicans remain stalled over funding the federal government as Republicans launch a new attack on the Affordable Care Act. Meanwhile,...

item.title: Un miedo ancestral cada vez más común: “Voy a morir solo”
item.description: Esto es algo que se preguntan muchos adultos mayores que viven solos, una población que ya supera las 16 millones de personas y que sigue creciendo.

item.title: It’s a Bird! It’s a Plane! It’s a Chemtrail? New Conspiracy Theory Takes Wing at Kennedy’s HHS

item.description: The health secretary’s statement doesn’t consider the impact that the Medicaid cuts advanced in the same law will have on health care in rural America...
